attributes.action: allow Dogs to travel by Euro Star
attributes.additional_details:
Euro Star does not allow pets on any of it's trains. All other uk & european rail operators allow pets. Please help me encourage Euro star to change their policy.
25% of Uk have a Dog and would love to take them on holiday it is too stressful to drive as it can take 2 days and not everyone as a car, Euro star takes 2 hours.
